title: Who had the best Grammy outfits in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm a very partial judge. Most of the Grammy outfits in my opinion were extremely tacky and “out there” just to get attention. I'm really referring to the red carpet fashion here. I did like Gwen Stefani's outfit (both her red carpet and stage ones). BTS looked amazing, as always. I'm honestly trying to think of other outfits but the only ones I can think of are ones I didn't like (imo).
